Articles.Content:
Hey guys, just thought I would share my replica of a Boeing 747 in KSP, the main fuselage is made up of fuel tanks so if you wish too get more fuel you just simply connect each engine to the back tank. But it has lots of fuel anyway. Hope you like ;P

It is very fast, is very controllable and looks the part ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Here are the pics:

> ![7237154336_5dd01701d7_b.jpg](http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7230/7237154336_5dd01701d7_b.jpg)
> ![7237161696_db0e2c32d4_b.jpg](http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8010/7237161696_db0e2c32d4_b.jpg)
> 
> ![7237157250_cb72c6e189_b.jpg](http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5271/7237157250_cb72c6e189_b.jpg)
> 
> ![7237164244_519b56c0ff_b.jpg](http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5276/7237164244_519b56c0ff_b.jpg)
> 
> ![7237149510_5219d2d7bc_b.jpg](http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7090/7237149510_5219d2d7bc_b.jpg)
Come to think of it, yours makes a very good replica of an A340.
